content.text: Match ends, Mallorca 1, Valencia 1.
Adil Rami (Valencia) is shown the yellow card.
Second Half ends, Mallorca 1, Valencia 1.
Adil Rami (Valencia) is shown the red card.
Sofiane Feghouli (Valencia) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Alejandro Alfaro (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sofiane Feghouli (Valencia).
Goal!  Mallorca 1, Valencia 1. Tomer Hemed (Mallorca) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Mehmet Topal (Valencia) is shown the yellow card for hand ball.
